item.title: GS Macro
item.description: gist image Goldman Sachs Macro At a Glance latex $$\int_{a}^{b} x^2 dx$$ The following $$\int_{a}^{b} x^2 dx$$ Is an integral $$ \begin{align} \vec{a} \cdot \vec{b} &= |\vec{a}||\vec{b}|cos\theta \\\\\ &= a_1b_1+a_2b_2 \end{align} $$ $$ \begin{align} \vec{a} \cdot \vec{b} &= |\vec{a}||\vec{b}|cos\theta \\ &= a_1b_1+a_2b_2 \end{align} $$ $$ \begin{align} A^{\[0\]} & = Input Feature & (1) \\\\\ Z^{\[1\]} & = W^{\[1\]}A^{\[0\]} & (2) \\\\\ A^{\[1\]} & = g(Z^{\[1\]}) & (3) \\\\\ Z^{\[2\]} & = W^{\[2\]}A^{\[1\]} & (4) \\\\\ A^{\[2\]} & = g(Z^{\[2\]}) & (5) \end{align} $$ $$ \begin{align} A^{[0]} & = Input Feature & (1) \\
